The tool MAY provide progress bars for large file processing

structured.title: Requirement 1
structured.content:
The TUI MUST display multiple widgets with real-time data

The TUI MUST display multiple widgets with real-time data
The TUI MUST support keyboard navigation between widgets
The TUI MUST implement responsive layout for terminal resize
The TUI MUST support mouse interactions
The TUI MUST provide charts and graphs visualization
The TUI MUST implement scrollable logs widget
The TUI MUST support theme customization
The TUI MUST provide command palette with fuzzy search
The TUI SHOULD support data export functionality
The TUI MAY support plugin system

{
  "business": [],
  "performance": {
    "p95_latency_ms": 50,
    "p99_latency_ms": 100,
    "throughput_rps": 60,
    "cpu_limit": "500m",
    "memory_limit": "256Mi",
    "refresh_rate_fps": 30
  }
}

requirements.description: The server MUST listen on a configurable TCP port
The protocol MUST implement a custom message format with header and payload
The server MUST support at least 100 concurrent connections
The protocol MUST include message types: CONNECT, DISCONNECT, DATA, ACK, ERROR
The server MUST implement connection timeout (30 seconds idle)
The protocol MUST include message checksums for integrity verification
The server SHOULD support message compression using gzip
The protocol SHOULD implement rate limiting per client
The server MAY support TLS encryption

input.primaryIntent: The server MUST listen on a configurable TCP port

structured.title: Requirement 1
structured.content:
The server MUST listen on a configurable TCP port

The server MUST listen on a configurable TCP port
The protocol MUST implement a custom message format with header and payload
The server MUST support at least 100 concurrent connections
The protocol MUST include message types: CONNECT, DISCONNECT, DATA, ACK, ERROR
The server MUST implement connection timeout (30 seconds idle)
The protocol MUST include message checksums for integrity verification
The server SHOULD support message compression using gzip
The protocol SHOULD implement rate limiting per client
The server MAY support TLS encryption

Constraints:
{
  "business": [
    "http",
    "websocket",
    "grpc"
  ],
  "performance": {
    "p95_latency_ms": 50,
    "p99_latency_ms": 100,
    "throughput_messages_per_second": 1000,
    "concurrent_connections": 100,
    "cpu_limit": "2000m",
    "memory_limit": "1Gi"
  }
}
